Why choose Easybank?

We leverage Open Banking to turn your bank account into your financial hub.
Control your Finances like never before

Online Banking

Our modern web and mobile applications allow you to keeptrack of your finances wherever you are in the world.

Simple Budgeting

See exactly where your money goes each month. Receive notifications when you're close to hitting you limits

Fast Onboarding

We don't do branches. Open your account in minutes online and start taking control of your finances right away

Open API

Manage your savings, investments, pension , and much more from one account. Tracking your money has never been easier
